import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import { Col,Row,Card,CardBody,CardImg } from 'reactstrap' import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" import Suits from './suits.jpeg' import Pro from './pro.jpeg' import Design1 from './design1.jpeg' import Shoe2 from './shoe2.jpeg' import Shoe3 from './shoe3.jpeg' import Shoe4 from './shoe4.jpeg' import Shoe5 from './shoe5.jpeg' import Shoe6 from './shoe6.jpeg' function Adidas_new_component() { const [img1, finalimg1] = useState(Suits) const [img2,finalimg2] = useState(Design1) function handleMouseEnter1(){ finalimg1(Pro) } function handleMouseEnter2(){ finalimg1(Suits) } return (
) } export default Adidas_new_component
